summary: A dark background color scheme, with light color for text comments
name: adrian.vim
description:
This colorscheme is a dark background colorscheme.  Comments are in light grey and other text is highlighted to aid me in thermal analysis syntax highlighting.

The latest version should always be found at: http://www.naglenet.org/vim/vimfiles/colors/adrian.vim

Sample screen shot:
small> http://www.naglenet.org/images/vim/tak_scrnsht-s.jpg
original> http://www.naglenet.org/vim/tak_screenshot.html

Comments are always welcome.
install_details:
Install two options:

A) Current session:
1> Copy or move the file into the "colors/" directory in the runtimepath.
2> In command mode, type
:colo adrian

B) Permanent
1> Enter the following line in you vimrc file:
colorscheme adrian
